title: cata-list
description: Useful lists of some of the best info, media, tools, and quotes for those who seek to understand and improve this world.

articles.title: FBI Expands Ability to Monitor Social Media, Location Data

articles.title: Roundup Maker to Pay $10 Billion to Settle Cancer Suits
articles.description: Bayer faced tens of thousands of claims linking the weedkiller to cases of non-Hodgkin's lymphoma. Some of the money is set aside for future cases.

articles.title: An Algorithm That 'Predicts' Criminality Based on a Face Sparks a Furor
articles.description: Its creators said they could use facial analysis to determine if someone would become a criminal. Critics said the work recalled debunked 'race science.'

articles.description: The exemption allows companies to bypass an EPA law meant to address widespread contamination from perflourinated chemicals

articles.description: US courts disagree on whether suspects can be forced to unlock their phones.

articles.description: When permafrost thaws, sea ice disappears, and wildfires rage in the north, the consequences extend to the rest of the world.

articles.title: My Family Saw a Police Car Hit a Kid on Halloween. Then I Learned How NYPD Impunity Works.
articles.description: ProPublica Deputy Managing Editor Eric Umansky's family saw an unmarked NYPD cruiser hit a Black teenager. He tried to find out how it happened, and instead found all of the ways the NYPD is shielded from accountability.

articles.title: America's Black Communities Are Suffering. Violent Protests Will Make the Suffering Worse

articles.title: Millions of Abandoned Oil Wells Are Leaking Methane, a Climate Menace
